p: We also analyzed 487 full-length genomic sequences of SARS-CoV-2 from GISAID database. Sequenced specimens were collected from December 2019 to April 2020, from the following Countries: Germany, Italy, Spain, France, UK, Sweden and USA. NC_045512.2 genome deposited in the GenBank has been used as SARS-CoV-2 reference genome. Muscle and Jalview software were used for genomes alignment and analysis.
